refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function sets alternative function for DIO channels. By default alternative DIO channel functions ENC1, ENC2, PWM1, PWM2, PWM3 and UART are enabled. This function will return error if direction of DIO channels does not allow to set selected function (e.g DIO channel configured as an output, user wants to configure ENC1).

listitem.para: enable: Alternative DIO function state (1 - enable, 0 - disable)
